name: Tabber
description: A Chrome Extension that adds additional keyboard shortcuts to Chrome

move-tab-left.description: Move active tab to the left one tab

move-tab-right.description: Move active tab to the right one tab

move-tab-to-front.description: Move active tab to the front of the tab list

move-tab-to-back.description: Move active tab to the back of the tab list

pop-out-tab.description: Pop active tab out of current window into a new window

reattach-tab.description: Attach currently focused tab to the last focused Chrome browser window
